name: BrainTraining
0:
”Alexa, open brain training”
”Alexa, start brain training”
”Alexa, launch brain training”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: brain training
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Brain Training is an Alexa skill designed to challenge and sharpen your mind, whether you're playing solo or with friends!

Single Player Mode:
• Answer a wide variety of brain-teasing questions with a simple "yes" or "no."
• Earn points: Each correct answer gives you 1 point.
• Check your score anytime by saying "stop."
• After every 10 questions, your total score will be revealed.

Multiplayer Mode:
• Challenge your friends and family in a fun brain workout! Play with up to 4 players.
• Every 20 questions, the scores will be announced to see who’s leading.
• To end the game early, say "stop" and Alexa will reveal all scores and close the skill.

Try multiplayer mode and find out who’s got the sharpest mind among your friends and family!
